name: LeadershipFlashBriefingbyDrRickGoodman
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enable this flash briefing skill and listen to the latest trends, tips and leadership success stories provided by Dr. Rick Goodman an International Leadership Expert, Author, Keynote Speaker and Executive Coach.

When you enable this skill, you will hear updates on:

• The most up to date information on leadership, employee engagement and business growth solutions.
• Interviews with Thought leaders in Business, Sports and Entertainment

• Learn how to develop a Solutions Oriented Mindset and achieve world class results in your business and life
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
